entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 08:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 60 percent chance of drizzle late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
